label: Frontend Framework Introduction
description: Overview of modern frontend development trends, introducing features and use cases of mainstream frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular

label: Component-Based Development
description: How to design reusable components, explaining core concepts like component lifecycle, props passing, and event handling

label: State Management
description: Exploring best practices of state management tools like Redux, Vuex, and Zustand, and when to use global state management

label: Routing Design
description: Introduction to routing design patterns in single-page applications, including dynamic routes, nested routes, and route guards

label: Performance Optimization
description: Sharing practical tips for improving application performance, including lazy loading, code splitting, and virtual lists
